document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Krynicki, I.
bibRefCitation.refString: Krynicki, I. (1832) Enumeratio Coleopterorum Rossiae meridionalis et praecipe in Universitatis Caesareae Charkoviensis circulo ovbenientium, quae annorum 1827 - 1831 spatio observavit. Bulletin se la Societe Imperiale des Naturalistes de Moscou, 5, 65 - 179.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. West Palaearctic (excluding North Africa) ( Meregalli & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
30 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , IMC , YKC ) from 5 provinces were studied.
Crimea
. :
2 spec. ( ZIN ) Eupatoria , V . E. Yakovlev leg.,
6.iv.1905
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) idem,
5.v.1906
;

28.x.1904
;

31.vii.1905
;

5.iv.1906
;

18.iv.1923
;

14.vi.1951
;

13.iv.1951
;

14.x.1951
;

Salsola
plants, I. Maltsev leg.,

;

13.iv.1951
;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Belozyorka Distr. , Potievka , salt marsh,

22.v.2011
.

Biology. Xerothermic habitats. Adults occur in IV–X. Oligophagous on Chenopodioideae ( Amaranthaceae )
Salsola spp .
,
Atriplex tatarica
,
Halimione verrusifera ( Lukjanovitch 1958 )
,
Suaeda arcuata ( Nasreddinov 1977 )
.
Notes. Record from Yekaterinoslav Governorate ( Krynicki 1832 ) is provisionally adopted here to province level: DNI DON LUG.
